0.1.name: wordpress/seo-live-keyword-monitor
0.1.description: Check the keyword density of your articles with this pretty cool SEO Live Keyword Monitor plugin in realtime. All you have to do is adding tags to your article using the standard WordPress tag box and press save. The SEO Live Keyword Monitor box will now check the current keyword density of the selected tags in realtime while you are writing your article. On-page optimization based on your selected tags has never been easier!
